mapper.select: SELECT boxStock, boxPrice, boxName, boxSize, boxType FROM boxInfo WHERE boxType LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY boxNo
SELECT boxStock, boxPrice, boxName, boxSize, boxType FROM boxInfo WHERE boxType LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY boxNo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderList (ordNo, shipName, shipAddress1, shipAddress2, shipPhone, shipHope, ordStatus, userId, totalPrice) VALUES (#{ordNo}, #{shipName}, #{shipAddress1}, #{shipAddress2}, #{shipPhone}, #{shipHope}, 1, #{userId}, #{totalPrice})
INSERT INTO orderDetail (ordNo, boxType, boxQty, selPrice) VALUES (#{ordNo}, #{boxType}, #{boxQty}, #{selPrice})
INSERT INTO reserve1 (resNo, pNo, sender, receiver, resState) VALUES (#{resNo}, #{pNo}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, 0)

INSERT INTO reserveDetail (resNo, pickup, food, senderName, senderPhone, senderEmail, storList, request, resState) VALUES (#{resNo}, #{pickup}, #{food}, #{senderName}, #{senderPhone}, #{senderEmail}, #{storList}, #{request}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT p.pWriteTitle, p.pNo, p.pAddress1, p.pAddress2, p.pImage, r.reviewEnd FROM reserve1 r, place p WHERE r.sender=#{userId} and r.resState=3 and p.pNo=r.pNo ORDER BY r.reviewEnd DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (reviewContent, reviewGrade, userId, pNo) VALUES (#{content}, #{grade}, #{userId}, #{pNo})
mapper.select: SELECT p.pWriteTitle, p.pNo, p.pAddress1, p.pAddress2, r.reviewContent, r.reviewGrade, r.reviewDate, r.reviewNo FROM review r, place p WHERE r.userId=#{userId} and p.pNo=r.pNo ORDER BY reviewDate DESC Limit #{start}, 4
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE userId=#{userId} and pNo=#{pNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reserve1 WHERE sender=#{userId} and pNo=#{pNo} and resState=3
